name: Last Robot Heart
description:
Thanks for clicking on my game!

The goal of the game is simple: 

Don't let the enemies hit you or the heart

Controls: 

A and D to move 

SPACE to jump

I,O,P  for your abilities 

Remember: 

 - Explosives are can destroyed any enemy in one shot, whereas your sword can not

- Skeletons can only be destroyed with explosives.
